attributes.agent_name: Motus Select Hyundai Kia Renault Nelspruit
attributes.description:
With its eye-catching exterior styling, bold headlamps and
muscular stance, the all-new KIA Seltos is a compact SUV like
no other. Not that you would expect anything less from KIA:
with one of the most awarded design teams in the world,
state-of-the-art production technology and world-class
quality credentials, the Seltos is the car you’ve been
waiting for.
Inspired by Greek mythology, the all-new KIA Seltos represents the
brave and assertive spirit of Seltos, son of Hercules. So whether
you’re conquering the urban jungle or exploring the great outdoors,
the all-new KIA Seltos is up for any challenge. And with seven
amazing exterior colours to choose from – including three exciting
two-tone options – your car will match your jovial mood come rain
or shine.

attributes.description:
For more info please contact or WhatsApp
Fred: 082 308 0578
Martin: 076 875 4311

attributes.title: 2021 Kia Picanto 1.0 Street

attributes.description:
KIA Picanto 1.2 MT Style MY20
Stunning Picanto Style in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Electric windows and mirrors. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Manual transmission that allows for a smooth and comfortable drive across town. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this hatchback for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description: Contact the Group 1 Sales team by filing in the form, we typically call you back within a few minutes. Look out for our call from the 27 600 number. We can offer you the best finance options to suit your needs. No need to sell your car privately, we offer fair and transparent trade in prices. One of our Sales consultants can come too you in the comfort of your own home or at your place of work so that you can view the car in a nonpressurized environment. We can arrange Nationwide delivery. All our cars undergo a Multipoint mechanical check to insure the best peace of mind. Become a part of the Group 1 Family today TsCs Apply. Call us on 021 903 0500

attributes.description: A cracking example of the Boxster S, this full service history example is in wonderful condition and has been used respectfully and sparingly. Its the 6 speed manual, a true mid engined sports car with almost perfect power to weight to create a most involving and exciting machine, the 987 is a great all rounder. Nothing to spend, just get in and enjoy spring as its meant to be.
attributes.title: 2005 Porsche Boxster S

attributes.description: Own this Beautiful one Owner Kia Soul,Finance is available ,Trade ins Welcome and Nationwide delivery. BB Group is a well-established Franchise with a wide variety. We strive to give excellent service. All Trade-ins are welcome. A Full and Detailed Workshop Quality Inspection is Done on Each of vehicles along with a AA Dekra Roadworthy test prior to any Delivery taken. This is to ensure peace of mind for each of our Valued customers. For Excellent Service Contact our Sales Manager - Barend Conradie As part of a 60-year legacy, this fully fledged automotive dealer group offers New cars, Used Cars, Parts and service to all existing and potential customers. With us you can always expect a little more and once you’re a client, it is hardly a fleeting experience
